name: Banana Fever
description:
Nana the Banana Island is under attack by a group of minions who are looking for bananas. They decided to take over this island and take all the bananas grown on the island. Your job as the mayor is to protect the banana farm and your people and prevent the minions from taking your bananas. 

A cute FPS shooter game

WASD to move, SPACE to Jump, RIGHT CLICK to aim, LEFT CLICK to shoot
